channel.title: Error on 'run server'
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException : 17 at ItemHandler.LoadItemList<ItemHandler.java:346> at ItemHandlet.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39> at server.main<server.java:28>
i added bronze boots, bronze platebody and bronze platelegs, then i edited the bonus and this happened

item.title: Error on 'run server'

item.description:
@baazie wrote:

set your back up back and try it aigan

this isn’t from compiling this error comes up when i click on run server.
it says ‘purespkscape is online’
then underneath that the error appears

item.title: Error on 'run server'
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nt_Arr0w Anc13nt Arr0w
item.description:
@Anc13nt_Arr0w wrote:

When you run the compiler, it will point out the mistakes, underneaf the mistake will be a “^”,
Look out for it and try correct it. Or you might of Done something wrong hence
Missed out a “}” When moving to next code…

These things look easy to spot out… but when it comes to your compiling its annoying.

Regards from Anc13nt Arr0w

Read full topic
